dialogues.DOC MILES:
[1]Doc Miles. 
[2]Sorry baby, I just got the message. 
[3]Alright, slow down. You say you've been poisoned. Can you describe the symptoms? 
[4]Blurred vision? 
[5]Dizziness? 
[6]Pain in your chest? 
[7]What are you doing? 
[8]The flow of adrenaline is keeping you alive. 
[9]Listen, Chev - you have to keep moving. 
[10]If I'm right, they gave you the Beijing Cocktail... very nasty ... works on your adrenal gland, blocking your receptors. The only way to slow it down is to keep the flow of adrenaline constant. 
[11]Meaning: if you stop, you die. 
[12]If you stop, you die. 
[13]Have you taken anything? 
[14]Oh boy. Well, that's a start. Look, I'll be back in LA in an hour. I'll call you as soon as I land. Keep yourself pumped up. Don't stop, don't quit, I'll be there. 
[15]
[16]Relax. I mean don't relax. Listen to me. The shit they gave you is cutting off your adrenaline. 
[17]Your only shot is to massively increase the level of ephedrine in your body ... to force out the inhibitors ... 
[18]You've got to get to an emergency room and get yourself some epinephrine ... it's artificial adrenaline ... it comes in 10 milligram syringes ... the shit's potent so don't overdo it ... probably a fifth of an injection will do. 
[19]nephrin.    Epi-nephrin. 
[20]I'll call you - 
[21]Chevy! 
[22]I'm in the air, man.     Did you get the stuff I told you? 
[23]You took it? 
[24]You shot the whole thing, didn't you? 
[25]Oh boy. I said a fifth of a syringe, you idiot. Now you're dead for sure. 
[26]Chest is on fire. 
[27]But you're cold. 
[28]You got a steel hard on. 
[29]That's the stimulation of the blood vessels ... your urinary sphincter is tight as a knot ... couldn't pee to save your life ... 
[30]Maybe you can get a hold of some vicadin ... you still at the hospital? 
[31]Maybe some weed ... I don't know ... 
[32]Well, that shit should be out of your system in a half hour or so, if you live that long ... this air phone is costing me a fortune ... look, I'll be in LA in twenty minutes. I'll call you when I hit the ground. 
[33]You're a good kid, Chev.   Nice knowing you. 
[34]Chevy! Holy shit, man, I've been trying to reach you for a half hour. 
[35]I'm at my office. Can you get here? 
[36]You're my best customer. 
[37]Synthetic ephedrine, diluted with saline. 
[38]Oh, I also gave you a little meth. That's the endorphins rushing into to your brain that you're feeling. 
[39]Fuck no. You're in such shit shape it's stunning. I've never seen a heart take this kind of punishment and keep ticking. You should be in a fucking medical journal or something. 
[40]The solution I'm giving you is acting as a competitive inhibitor... meaning it pushes the poison out of your receptors and replaces it with a chemical... it's a temporary fix... 
[41]Look, if we put you on life support we could maybe string you out for a few days, but at some point you'd almost certainly lapse into a coma... and then... 
[42]f you want, I can load you up with 
[43]Can I do that for you, Chev? 
[44]Then ... what?
dialogues.ORLANDO:
[1]It's cool it's cool it's cool!

[6]
[7]Can we all just get along?   Can we? 
[8]Now Chevy here has something he would like to discuss. So we are going to discuss it. In a civilized manner. Chevy? I believe you had a question, or some point you were trying to make? 
[9]OK. I am not affiliated with Ricky Verona. 
[10]Easy ... easy ... now things are beginning to clarify ... you see how that works? How discussion can lead to clarity? 
[11]Clearly you are operating under a false pretense. Ricky Verona and myself did not "pull the Anselmo job together." In fact, Ricky Verona fucked me on the Anselmo job. In fact, Ricky Verona owes me seventy five hunna dollars. 
[12]But that's the way it is. That's the way it is. So you see, I don't know where Ricky Verona is. Because if I knew where he is, I would probably be there right now, beating his Gucci ass down. 
[13]Thank you. That's what I'm talking about. That resembles civility. 
[14]Shit dude, what's the matter with you? 
[15]I understand that. You've made that point abundantly clear to all of us. 
[16]Now what can I do to help you?

[21]Well? 
[22]You got something for me, or what? 
[23]Chevy ... come on, man... 
[24]
[25]Ah, so this is about the Don Kim situation. 
[26]I know you pulled the trigger. 
[27]O...kay... 
[28]Whoa, Chelios. You good, man? 
[29]Beg your pardon? 
[30]Well, a man's got to do what a man's got to do. Uhh... what exactly is it that you got to do? 
[31]What? 
[32]You got no time, period. 
[33]But you know this has got to stop sometime. What do you think you are, Michael Myers? They pop you and you just keep gettin up?
dialogues.CARLITO:
[1]Chevy. 
[2]I'm surprised to see you. 
[3]Ha!   So I've heard. 
[4]Word travels fast.     You amaze me, my friend. 
[5]The shit they gave you ... it's the Chinese shit. There is no antidote.     I wish there was something I could do. 
[6]Honestly, you should be dead already. It's a miracle. 
[7]We give that shit to horses ... 
[8]C          I'm sorry.  heads afloat.  
[9]What do you expect me to do? 
[10]Verona? That's just a small time punk. But... that's not to say there isn't an opportunity here. 
[11]Everyone knows the love I have for you, Chev. Maybe this can even the score for the Don Kim hit, which was perhaps ill- advised. 
[12]The heat from Hong Kong has been more than we anticipated. 
[13]Don't be difficult. 
[14]re you disrespecting me, Chev?    Is that 
[15]Chelios... what a fucking mess you are. 
[16]Why don't you sit down? 
[17]Let me see that. 
[18]Clever ... what is this, an insulin pump? 
[19]Ephedrine, right? 
[20]Very resourceful ... 
[21]That's enough. 
[22]I said that's enough. It's been a long day. But in the end, you must agree, it all works out quite nicely. Don Kim gets his bullet, thanks to you... 
[23]The Chinese shit. Hold him down. 
[24]I'm afraid the Houdini act is over, Chelios. 
[25]Shut up, Verona. 
[26]Get me out of here! NOW! 
[27]I'll kill you for this, Chelios! 
[28]Get down! 
[29]Ronnie James Dio...! 
[30]Jesus, man, where the fuck where you?

[1]Yeah, yeah.     You wanna know what I was doing? 
[2]What? What? You heard me.      That son of a bitch Ricky Verona. 
[3]I think I know what I have to do.

[9]
[10]Interesting. Downtown Charlie O's?

[13]You.   Get me some ... I need ... 
[14]OK ... needles, hate needles ... 
[15]Took it. 
[16]I bought you some flowers, but they got fucked up on the way over here. 
[17]That shit's wearing off ... 
[18]Aww, damn it, I'm sorry baby... 
[19]Congratulations.

[21]What the fuck is this, you working for the Chinese now? 
[22]ike this? WHERE'S VERONA?

dialogues.HOOD #1:
[1]Where's he going? 
[2]Verona got nothing to do with this. 
[3]Don Carlos wants you off the street. 
[4]You've totally lost your shit, dude ... you're all over the TV ... destroying property, making unauthorized hits ... you're causing the organization a great deal of embarrassment.
